SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http

Class HTTPAuthenticationMethods

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPAuthenticationMethods
public final class HTTPAuthenticationMethods extends Object
Constants for HTTP authentication methods. This class extends the standard servlet authentication methods with additional methods for modern token-based authentication schemes.
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    BASIC_AUTH
    Basic Authentication (RFC 7617) - username/password with base64 encoding.
    static final String
    BEARER_AUTH
    Bearer Token Authentication (RFC 6750) - token-based authentication.
    static final String
    CLIENT_CERT_AUTH
    Client Certificate Authentication - X.509 certificate validation.
    static final String
    DIGEST_AUTH
    Digest Authentication (RFC 7616) - challenge/response with hashed credentials.
    static final String
    FORM_AUTH
    Form-based Authentication - HTML form login (servlet-specific).
    static final String
    JWT_AUTH
    JWT Authentication - JSON Web Token validation.
    static final String
    OAUTH_AUTH
    OAuth 2.0 Authentication (RFC 6749) - comprehensive OAuth flow support.

    • BEARER_AUTH

      public static final String BEARER_AUTH
      Bearer Token Authentication (RFC 6750) - token-based authentication. Used for API keys, JWT tokens, and OAuth 2.0 access tokens.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • OAUTH_AUTH

      public static final String OAUTH_AUTH
      OAuth 2.0 Authentication (RFC 6749) - comprehensive OAuth flow support. Includes access token validation, scope checking, and refresh handling.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • JWT_AUTH

      public static final String JWT_AUTH
      JWT Authentication - JSON Web Token validation. A specific type of Bearer token with additional claims validation.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • isTokenBased

      public static boolean isTokenBased(String authMethod)
      Check if an authentication method is token-based.
      Parameters:
      authMethod - the authentication method constant
      Returns:
      true if the method uses tokens rather than username/password

    • isCredentialBased

      public static boolean isCredentialBased(String authMethod)
      Check if an authentication method is credential-based (username/password).
      Parameters:
      authMethod - the authentication method constant
      Returns:
      true if the method uses username/password credentials

    • getScheme

      public static String getScheme(String authMethod)
      Get the HTTP header scheme name for an authentication method.
      Parameters:
      authMethod - the authentication method constant
      Returns:
      the scheme name used in Authorization headers, or null if not applicable
